content.description: Start with the same 2 bolts as one eyed oni then shimmy right up the plank to clip the 3rd bolt. Gain huecos and a crimp, power through to where the two lines converge at an undercling.  Finishes on the same anchor as the left line.  More powerful and reachy than the left line, shorter climbers might have trouble clipping the 3rd bolt.
content.location: Right line on the hueco'd face of the oni pillar.

content.description: This starts with a slab into to a ledge.  Stay left on the aret and at the 5th bolt do some technical climbing to gain the scoop.  Utilize holds on the aret and the one eye hueco through a crux to some better holds  The finish wraps to the right of the aret to a jug left of the chains. Excellent technical climbing!
content.location: South-west side of the pillar.  Line starts in the middle sharing 2 bolts with the right line and moves left.  Shared anchor.

content.description: This pillar is on the north-east side of the West side cliff.  The climbs on the pillar face south-west as apposed to east like the other climbs around it.  The south-west pillar's face has an obvious line of huecos running up its face.
